reviews.review_text: These fit %26 are comfortable. They also washed nice with no wrinkles. My husband needs black for a men's group uniform, %26 we were happy to find these at Walmart.com.

reviews.title: Great pants
reviews.review_text: Love these pants , the fabric is not to thin or to thick. The front pockets are nice and deep which Ilike, I don't have to worry about loosing item, keys etc falling out.

reviews.title: Huge benefit for my hubby
reviews.review_text: Very soft, light fabric, heck it's a golfer's brand but looks great for a semi casual dinner. Looks great on my hubby. Doesn't have that sag on the rear end, fits nicely around buttocks. Great to find a 29 length. Nice color. It's a 10 for me. I'm getting other colors.
Don't have to search for the right size at the store just ordered the correct size needed. The quality is very good.

reviews.title: Great pants!
reviews.review_text: The pants are great and I will definitely be buying more. My son wears them all the time and the only issue that we had was the seams coming apart in places a little faster than I liked but they do go through a lot of use that probably contributed to the issue also.

reviews.title: easy care.
reviews.review_text: Relatively cheap for pants. Son wears to fast food restaurant and they clean fairly well. Don't require ironing after coming out of dryer. Could handle it if you prefer sharp pleats but donnot look like you slept.in them if you don't iron them.

reviews.title: Look and fit nice.
reviews.review_text: They fit well, as expected. They look neat. I've only had them a short time, so time will tell and if able, I'll adjust my rating if necessary.

reviews.title: Skinny Jean office pants.
reviews.review_text: ‚ÄúBECAUSE TONIGHT WILL BE THE NIGHT THAT I WILL FALL FOR YOU!‚Äù 36x34? Yeah, okay! More like 32x34 with emo skinny jean gusto. My boxers saved my crotch from being exposed at the seam. These pants suck. Don't buy them.

reviews.title: Delivery Drivers/Vehicles Need Walmart ID
reviews.review_text: I was very unhappy about the delivery. The contract driver did not have any Walmart-related identification - either on her person or on her car. When she rang my door bell, l looked outside and saw nothing which indicated there was a legitimate package being delivered. I almost did not respond. I would feel safer, and Walmart would have fewer repeat-delivery attempts if their drivers and their vehicles carried visible Walmart identification.

reviews.title: the pants dont last
reviews.review_text: pants made by cheap material. have bought several pants and don't last. every single pant has torn from the back pockets. material is cheap.

reviews.title: Thumbs Up
reviews.review_text: Purchased these for my teen and he actually commented on how comfortable they were compared to pants from a higher end brand. They wash and dry well and the color is still nice.
I think the pants could be a little cheaper but I understand everything is getting a little higher these days. I use to get these pants for 12-13 dollars but I guess those days are gone.

I wear these pants as a part of my work uniform. They are very sturdy and very affordable. They are comfortable and easy to clean, and I work in an environment that is sometimes greasy and dirty. I am very pleased with the look, comfort and price.

reviews.title: Smaller size than expected
reviews.review_text: Bought the khakis in the same size and they fit great. Was like I need black pants so let's get the same size and brand in black. This fit a bit smaller than the khakis, I will need to check and see if it is all of them.

reviews.title: Mens pants
reviews.review_text: My husband loves these pants. They have large pockets that hold his keys and knife without falling out. They are a great value and hold up for for a couple years.

reviews.title: Runs a little large, good materials, comfortable
reviews.review_text: Good cut, materials and comfort. Runs a little large in waist and inseam though. Grey could be a better shade imo. Could be a better price too. But alright for what they are.

reviews.title: Excellent quality!
reviews.review_text: These pants are excellent quality! They even have a little change pocket inside the right pocket. They are true to size. My son has three pair and he loves them. These pants are all he wants to wear. I'm getting ready to buy him two more pair.
Comfy, stylish khaki pants. Great price, good fit. Never goes out of style.

reviews.title: Not for me
reviews.review_text: Looked nice but material a bit stiff and uncomfortable.
Love the fit of these pants. Have ordered several colors of George brand pants.

reviews.title: Value for your money
reviews.review_text: Nice and comfortable material, durable

reviews.title: Great buy
reviews.review_text: Pants are comfortable and wear like more expensive brands

reviews.title: Great pants for the price
reviews.review_text: These pants fit perfectly.

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.review_text: What can I say, they are comfortable and fit well
true to its size. fit well great length order the size and length you need.

reviews.title: Good looking pants and quality material.
reviews.review_text: Like the style and fit of the pants. Very comfortable around the waist.
I bought these for work pants for him and he likes them so much I'm buying them for casual wear as well.
The crease in the trousers was on the sides of the legs and no noticeable crease in the front which I had hoped for
Buying these George Pants for over 10 years and I love them. When I wear them out, I just order more!
I liked the way the pants fit on me as well as the material it'd perfect for work as I work outdoors
i have these on same size sifferent color. and somehow these dont fit. the quality is different. Lesson learned always gonto store and rry on item.
Well constructed pair of pants. Nice fit and good fabric composition. Wash and dry beautifully! Highly recommend
I am trying to retrieve the QR code fo my return but there is no one to contact
I've had a pair of the same pants and they have been great. I do think the 29 length is longer than my current 29s or I would have given 5 stars
I've purchased other items similar in more expensive stores and have not seen the value like I have for this item.

reviews.title: Daniel's workpants
reviews.review_text: Walmart.com sent me the incorrect item - I'm extremely disappointed. The order was for Straight cut and i was sent Regular
these pants are extremely comfortable for work and everyday use. they sir ived the forst wash and stayed black. Did not fade.
He loves the George pants. They fit perfectly. They launder great and they dry clean great. Comfortable for him. Last a long time.

reviews.title: the size and fit and quality were satisfactory
reviews.review_text: I had previously bought this style of pant 'in store' so I knew exactly what I ordered and was going to receive - the size and fit and quality were more than equal to the price-point.

reviews.title: George Men's pants
reviews.review_text: Better than expected, runs true to size, easy care
It fit well, looked good, and the person I was ordered for liked the item.
Fit and material are great, and at a very affordable price point
The quality of the pants appeared good, but I wanted charcoal color, not black, so I returned them.
The pants were better than expected. I was very impressed, thank you!

reviews.title: Don't like shopping, but this was painless.
reviews.review_text: Well made, comfortable and very reasonably priced.
I wear this certain brand of pants for work. I wish they had more selection of colors.
They are required for work...soooo...5 star all the way!!
live the pants, wish they had gray too very true to size.
nice dress pants. good price great quality. good price. thank you

reviews.title: Perfect fit!
reviews.review_text: Perfect fit! Tight enough around the waist but loose enough on the legs for comfort. Looks nice without being too fancy.

reviews.title: WRONG SIZE
reviews.review_text: You sent the wrong size kinda defeats the quick purpose of ordering now I have to drive to the store wait in line and deal with incompetent people

reviews.title: school pants
reviews.review_text: these are such a good fit for my son. he likes the regular straight leg. these are the only ones he will wear
I buy my work pants from Walmart I couldn't get to a store so I ordered online. The price I paid online was more than I paid onsite.

reviews.title: Comfortable!!
reviews.review_text: Super comfortable, and fits perfectly. One of my go-to pants for working in a professional setting. Definitely will buy again.

I ordered size 38 waste 29 inseam and have found the next time I order I will order a 36 x 29. Even after the 1st wash the waist size did not shrink nor did the inseam. Otherwise I am happy with my order.

reviews.title: Good pants with a serious flaw
reviews.review_text: The pants fit very well, and are quite comfortable. One very annoying thing about them is the zipper. It's a couple inches too short. I've bought and worn this style pants many times in the past, but this is my first purchase in about 3 years. The previously purchased pants had a more appropriately sized zipper, but this purchase obviously indicates that a change in construction has occurred. making the pants less desirable. This might be my last purchase of these pants. I'll be looking elsewhere for pants in the future.

reviews.title: Rugged, Comfortable, and Professional
reviews.review_text: Materials are good quality. Rugged and professional on the outside and comfortable to wear all day. I've purchased these for many years. Great for IT field work, for example. Machine wash cold or warm, tumble dry on medium or high heat. Hang up immediately after drying so no ironing is required. For me, they usually last 6 to 7 years with all of the punishment they go through.

reviews.title: Disappointed and Annoyed
reviews.review_text: First I will say these are nice pants, then the But. Ordered size 32-30 pants[these were ordered replace some of the same pants that have gotten badly stained] arrived in a few days an seemed to be large [they are 62% cotton] so washed them in hot water hoping the would shrink, no luck my 32-30 seem to be about size 33/34-34. BEWARE. These are going the clothing shelf

reviews.title: Great buy for big guys
reviews.review_text: Great deal for the price. They fit well and look nice. They have plenty of room in the thigh area and they stretch to give when bending and moving. My son is a bigger guy and we have trouble finding things that fit his thigh and these worked great he loves them.

reviews.title: Durable for a good price
reviews.review_text: These are great for daily use. I initially bought a pair while working out of town and the job extended, in which i needed more clothes. I wear these more often now than other pants. They are very comfortable and durable. they look like casual pants for half the price.

reviews.title: Fit and feel is great for my 48x30 sized husband!
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable, affordable work and leisure pants.

reviews.title: Nice look, great feel.
reviews.review_text: Very well made and great price
Very easy and quick to use in the shower. Very good price

reviews.title: Essentials work clothes
reviews.review_text: I received everything except for my pants and they probably because they won't fit me

reviews.title: George's Khaki work pants
reviews.review_text: nice fit %26 wrinkle free. My husband loves his comfortable work pants!üëçüèæ
This label is very well made. Compare to higher priced name brands. Fit and style excellent
It is frustrating to be charged extra for Big Men's products. I understand there is a small amount of extra material but the ratio of increase in price does not seem fair.
These are my favorite pants to get from Walmart, but they're never IN STORES, I always have to order and I don't alway have time to wait for delivery. Do better, Walmart.

reviews.title: For a man who is rough on his clothes
reviews.review_text: Great Pants for the price! I buy several every year for my older brother who loves them. They are very durable as he is rough on his clothes! The comfort fit waist sets them apart from others and they wash and dry well! I highly recommend them!

reviews.title: Very happy with this product!
reviews.review_text: I bought these exact pants but 36" flexible waist a few years ago. They were comfortable and wore well. When I lost weight and was swimming in them, I bought two pairs again in both colors and am very happy with how they fit and look.

reviews.title: Very good almost
reviews.review_text: Very comfortable and they wear well. I wear them all the time. The larger than their size (or at least feel that way) and are not exactly stylish. They wash easily and dry to fit.

reviews.title: Very nice.
reviews.review_text: They are a tad tight when you first wear them, but they will stretch a bit after the first wear. The fabric is stain resistant, I have accidentally tested it a few times and the pants came clean.

reviews.title: Bad Pants
reviews.review_text: While these pants are marked 36X29 size, they are not that size. They're too long and the waist is too large. I would estimate that the actual size is closer to 38X32. Walmart's cheap pants are junk.

reviews.title: Nice pants
reviews.review_text: All around, I like the pants but I bought a size 40 instead of a 38 so the waist is loose. I did this bc I wasnt able to try the pants on. Other than that I like the pants.

reviews.title: A great value
reviews.review_text: I bought these on a roll back. I already had one pair that I bought months ago, so I knew the right size. They fit well and are so comfortable. Plus, the price was right!

reviews.title: Lovely pants
reviews.review_text: Fit great, durable, goes with anything. My fianc√© needed some black slacks to wear to work and for less than $20, we decided to give these a try. He loves them.

reviews.title: Cheaply made
reviews.review_text: I took them back. They were very cheaply made and it was hard to find the correct size as opposed to the regular brands like Dickies or Wrangler. They wrinkled in the bag. Unless you want to iron, I would not recommend them.

reviews.title: inexpensive, casual, decently made pants.
reviews.review_text: Inexpensive casual pants that can be used in retail and restaurants. I've only had them a couple months and have washed them one time so far so good today is September 27th 2021

reviews.title: Decent khakis for a decent price
reviews.review_text: I haven't had these long enough to know how they will hold up, but they fit well, and the fabric seems thick and durable. These are my no-frills work pants.

reviews.title: Cut isn't quite right
reviews.review_text: The material of the pants, and the cut of the legs are good, but the waist is much too small. I would need to go up nearly two pant sizes to be comfortable in these.

reviews.title: good-looking pants cheap I bought two pair,blk ,tn
reviews.review_text: I have to say these are decent pants the stitching is robust and there is enough spandex so that my fat asss fits in well.

reviews.title: Fine Quality
reviews.review_text: The size of the pants i ordered were too small for me so had to return them, but the quality seemed fine.
They seem to be quality products and they hold up well. They are very nice looking and very comfortable too.
Legs were a little smaller considering this is a big mans pant. I would have liked a little more room there to be comfortable.
One of the pair of pants the manufacturer missed stitching the waistband. Will return one pair of pants.

reviews.title: Too large
reviews.review_text: love the pants, ordered 34" waist and these are too large , have similar pair in straight leg instead of regular fit and they fit perfectly

reviews.title: Super Premium Pants!
reviews.review_text: My husband loved them! Very comfortable, waistline is far superior to other similar pants I've had. Overall fit is just fantastic.
The quality of the pants was great. They fit my husband perfectly and they arrived on time since they were needed on Monday morning.

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
reviews.review_text: Very pleased with these pants. Fit was exact and overall quality was better than expected. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
reviews.review_text: Washes well, no shrinkage. Comfortable. I took a star off because for some reason they seem to be lint magnets. Good quality for the price.

34 X 22 is just right fit. Like khaki color better than blue jeans

reviews.review_text: Basic, sturdy, fit well, good value for the price. Wish they came in more colors.
